messages.message:
HI Team, When I run `cs stop`  my VSCode is reloading instead of service stop. I performed below steps
• Resync 
• Suspend and resume the sandbox
Even after performing above steps still issue cs stop is reloading the vscode. Any insights to sort this is much appreciated.

In general I would recommend using the terminal instead of the vscode IDE, I have experienced some issues with it in the past (mainly slowness). 
Regarding your specific issue, will need to defer to the crafting team :pug:
